name: Titanium.Platform.Android
summary: The Android-specific Platform module, used to access the device's platform-related functionality.

properties.name: physicalSizeCategory
properties.summary: The physical size category of the Android device or emulator.

constants.name: API_LEVEL
constants.summary: Android API level identifier of the Operating System.
constants.description: See the official Android Developers documentation for more information about API levels.

constants.name: PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_LARGE
constants.summary: Constant to indicate that the physical size category of the current device/emulator is large
constants.description: See the official Android Developers documentation for more information about large screen sizes

constants.name: PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_NORMAL
constants.summary: Constant to indicate that the physical size category of the current device/emulator is normal
constants.description: See the official Android Developers documentation for more information about normal screen sizes

constants.name: PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_SMALL
constants.summary: Constant to indicate that the physical size category of the current device/emulator is small
constants.description: See the official Android Developers documentation for more information about small screen sizes

constants.name: PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_UNDEFINED
constants.summary: Constant to indicate that the physical size category of the current device/emulator is undefined
constants.description: See the official Android Developers documentation for more information about undefined screen sizes

constants.name: PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_XLARGE
constants.summary: Constant to indicate that the physical size category of the current device/emulator is extra large
constants.description: See the official Android Developers documentation for more information about extra large screen sizes
